intro: Lastrea borneensis, commonly known as the Borneo lastrea, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from red to orange. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a slightly hairy texture. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique floral structure and limited distribution.
